__e: You're just begging for the isolation cell, aren't you?
Just take this to the patient in the isolation ward , will you?
So...who did you murder to get put here in maximum security?
Open the door, I will go with her to the treatment ward.
I got up to the second floor... where the security wing is, just like you said.
It is to be found in the south wing, over-looking the courtyard, where there is, of course, ample parking.
And open the bedroom of the south wing for my grandson.
Actually, I'm in the south wing.
I'll take him to the guesthouse. Fine. Good night.

I kind of got used to being a commander so when I arrived here at the hospital I took a look at the enlisted men's ward and then the officer's ward and I said to myself, "Let's let it ride along for a while."
Do you know what happens if I rank a man, if I send a trusty into the barracks?
He's never used the east wing before.
I'm heading for the East Wing now.
Next right-hander takes us into the east wing.
I was thinking of airing out the best room in the west wing, sir.
The only good view of the sea is from the west wing.
- You will get your new hospital wing.
I'm sure you'll be very happy in the new wing, Mrs Hartong.
I told him he could not go into the General's wing, and he says he cannot do the job.
